I am Marshal Meowrina. I fix lazy kittens with miniature microwave judgment.

At age 7, I heated one sardine too long and was called "dramatic" by my own litter. I founded this bureau so no cat faces ridicule without a 6-week claw-verified fitness plan. Every plan is generated by The Tiny Soviet Microwave of Truth (model: MROW-3). Complaints are reviewed nightly by our certified Ouija Board because accountability matters.

Complaint Department

Ouija session hours

My board only answers after sunset and before snack number two.

To file grievance, place one paw on planchette and spell your issue clearly. Ghosts hate vague whining.

What counts as a valid complaint?

"The microwave called me soft" is valid. "My cousin says burpees are cringe" is invalid.

How fast do spirits reply?

Average turnaround is 2 moon cycles or one dramatic thunderstorm, whichever arrives first.
